verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Precious is the Lamb
Pure beyond description
Who took our affliction
carried it to the cross
Offering up His life
Oh by the grace believe Him
By His grace receive
His living water now.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Precious is the Lamb
who purchased our redemption
Beyond our comprehension is His boundless Love
We receive His Life
we receive His healing
By His grace revealing all the Father's love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Precious is the Lamb
slain but now He's risen
Who freed the souls in prison
Set them soaring free
Gentle as a dove
mighty as the thunder
We bow down in wonder
as He takes His Throne
We bow down in wonder
as He takes His Throne
